findings.title: Suggested Adherence Of Checks-Effects-Interactions Pattern
findings.description: The adherence of `checks-ffects-interactions` principle is violated in the `MultiBridgeReceiver` contract, specifically in the `_executeMessage()` function.

findings.title: Meaningful Events For Important State Changes
findings.description: Lack of meaningful events to reflect changes in privileged routines, such as system-wide parameters or settings being changed, tokens being minted, transferred, or burned.

findings.title: (Limited) Trust Of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the Celer MultiBridge protocol, there is a privileged adapter-specific `owner` account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating each individual adapter.
